au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=4m_L2=1.3m_central_oct2011
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(510,0) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 97.70) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.70)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(27, 100) # Drive attenuator to 330 driveAtt(330)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(27, 0) driveBsz(261.0)
